mapper.select: select line_no from fct_line
select instr_no from prd_prc_mng where instr_no= #{instrNo}
select sum(nvl2(work_fin_dt,1,0)) as prcEndNull from prd_prc_mng where instr_no= #{instrNo}
select distinct prc_cd,prc_seq from adm_prd a join adm_prc_flow b on a.prd_cd = b.prd_cd where a.able_line_no like '%'||#{lineNo}||'%' order by prc_seq

select p.instr_no, p.work_str_time,p.work_str_date,p.goalCnt goalCnt, p.prc_seq from pdt_work_instr a join (select p.instr_no, p.work_str_time,p.work_str_date,p.pdt_cnt goalCnt, f.prc_seq from pdt_work_instr_dtl p, (select a.prd_cd, a.prd_nm, a.prd_std, a.mng_unit, a.prd_sect, a.able_line_no, a.use_yn, b.prc_cd, b.prc_seq, b.work_cmt, b.std_load, b.unit_cost, b.lead_time from adm_prd a join adm_prc_flow b on a.prd_cd = b.prd_cd where a.able_line_no like '%'||#{lineNo}||'%' and b.prc_cd=#{prcCd}) f where p.prd_cd = f.prd_cd and to_date(p.work_str_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND p.line_no=#{lineNo} and p.prc_cd=#{prcCd} order by p.work_str_time) p on a.instr_no = p.instr_no where a.now_phs='N' order by 1

select * from (select * from pdt_work_instr_dtl where instr_no=#{instrNo} ) a join(select * from adm_prc_flow where prd_cd=(select prd_cd from pdt_work_instr_dtl where instr_no=#{instrNo} and prc_cd=#{prcCd})) b on(a.prc_Cd=b.prc_cd AND a.prd_cd=b.prd_cd)

select * from (select * from pdt_work_instr_dtl where instr_no=#{instrNo} and prc_cd=#{prcCd} ) a join(select * from adm_prc_flow where prd_cd=(select prd_cd from pdt_work_instr_dtl where instr_no=#{instrNo} and prc_cd=#{prcCd})) b on(a.prc_Cd=b.prc_cd AND a.prd_cd=b.prd_cd)
mapper.insert: insert into prd_prc_mng (instr_no , line_no ,prc_cd , goal_cnt) values (#{instrNo},#{lineNo},#{prcCd},#{pdtCnt})
mapper.update: update prd_prc_mng set work_str_dt=sysdate , now_phs='가동중' where instr_no=#{instrNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} And prc_cd=#{prcCd}
mapper.select: select work_str_dt ,now_phs from prd_prc_mng where instr_no=#{instrNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} And prc_cd=#{prcCd}
select count(work_str_dt) from prd_prc_mng where work_str_dt is not null group by instr_no having instr_no=#{instrNo}
mapper.update: update prd_prc_mng set work_fin_dt=sysdate , now_phs=#{msg}, goal_cnt=#{goalCnt}, pdt_cnt=#{pdtCnt}, flt_cnt=#{fltCnt} where instr_no=#{instrNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} And prc_cd like '%'||#{prcCd}||'%'
mapper.select: select work_fin_dt ,now_phs from prd_prc_mng where instr_no=#{instrNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} And prc_cd=#{prcCd}
select count(work_fin_dt) from prd_prc_mng where work_fin_dt is not null group by instr_no having instr_no=#{instrNo}
select prd_sect from adm_prd where prd_cd=(select prd_Cd from pdt_work_instr_dtl WHERE instr_no=#{instrNo} and line_no=#{lineNo} and prc_cd=#{prcCd})
mapper.insert: insert into pdt_cmpt_prd_stck (PRD_LOT,PRD_CD,STCK_CNT) values (PKG_MAKE_CODE.CODE('PRD','PDT_CMPT_PRD_STCK','PRD_LOT'), (select prd_Cd from pdt_work_instr_dtl WHERE instr_no=#{instrNo} and line_no=#{lineNo} and prc_cd=#{prcCd}),#{pdtCnt})

insert into mtr_lot_stck (MTR_LOT,MTR_CD,STCK_CNT,HLD_CNT) values(PKG_MAKE_CODE.CODE('HRD','MTR_LOT_STCK','MTR_LOT'),(select prd_Cd from pdt_work_instr_dtl WHERE instr_no=#{instrNo} and line_no=#{lineNo} and prc_cd=#{prcCd}),#{pdtCnt},0)
mapper.update: update prd_prc_mng set flt_cnt = #{fltCnt} where instr_no=#{instrNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} And prc_cd=#{prcCd}
mapper.select: select PKG_MAKE_CODE.CODE('PRD','PDT_CMPT_PRD_STCK','PRD_LOT') as prdLot from dual
select PKG_MAKE_CODE.CODE('HRD','MTR_LOT_STCK','MTR_LOT') as prdLot from dual
mapper.insert: insert into msg_alt (msg_no , alt_send_dt, alt_send_dept , alt_recp_dept , alt_cmt) values ( PKG_MAKE_CODE.CODE('MSG','MTR_LOT_STCK','MTR_LOT') , sysdate , '수리부서' , 'PDT'||','||#{lineNo}||','||#{prcCd} , '공정설비 고장낫어요 빨리와주세요.')
mapper.update: update prd_prc_mng set work_str_dt=sysdate , now_phs='긴급중단' where instr_no=#{instrNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} And prc_cd=#{prcCd}
mapper.select: select instr_No , line_No , prc_Cd , to_char(work_Str_Dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') work_str_dt ,to_char(work_Fin_Dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') work_fin_dt , goal_Cnt ,pdt_cnt , flt_cnt ,now_phs , prd_lot from prd_prc_mng where instr_no=#{instrNo} AND line_no = #{lineNo}

select (to_number(sum(nvl2(work_fin_dt,1,0)))+to_number(sum(nvl2(work_str_dt,1,0)))+to_number(sum(nvl(flt_cnt,0)))+to_number(sum(nvl2(now_phs,1,0)))+to_number(sum(nvl(pdt_cnt,0)))) as upCheck from prd_prc_mng
select count(now_phs) from prd_prc_mng where now_phs like '%가동종료%'
select line_no , prc_cd ,instr_no ,nvl(pdt_cnt,0) pdt_cnt,(nvl(goal_cnt,0)-nvl(flt_cnt,0)) goalCnt from prd_prc_mng where now_phs='가동중'
mapper.update: update prd_prc_mng set pdt_cnt=#{pdtCnt} where instr_no = #{instrNo} and prc_cd=#{prcCd}
mapper.select: select distinct instr_no from prd_prc_mng where to_date(work_str_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select a.prc_seq,b.line_no , a.prc_cd , b.goal_cnt , b.pdt_cnt , nvl(b.flt_cnt,0) as fltCnt , b.now_phs from(select prc_seq , prc_cd from adm_prc_flow where prd_Cd = (select distinct prd_cd from pdt_work_instr_dtl where instr_no=#{instrNo} ) ) a join (select * from prd_prc_mng where to_date(work_str_dt,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') and instr_no=#{instrNo}) b on a.prc_cd=b.prc_cd order by 1
